title: WCAG 2.2 AA Compliance Patterns

patterns.name: Accessible Form Labels
patterns.description: Use sr-only class for visually hidden but screen-reader accessible labels

patterns.name: Fieldset/Legend for Groups
patterns.description: Wrap related form controls in fieldset with legend for screen readers

patterns.name: aria-live for Dynamic Content
patterns.description: Announce content changes to screen readers

patterns.name: Semantic List Structure
patterns.description: Use ul/li for card grids instead of divs

patterns.name: Decorative Elements Hidden
patterns.description: Hide purely visual elements from screen readers

patterns.name: Video Accessibility
patterns.description: Include captions and audio descriptions for video content

patterns.name: Skip to Content Link
patterns.description: Allow keyboard users to bypass navigation
patterns.code: Skip to main content

patterns.name: Touch Target Size
patterns.description: Ensure interactive elements are at least 44x44px

insights: ARIA should enhance semantic HTML, not replace it
aria-hidden removes elements entirely from accessibility tree
aria-live='polite' waits for pause before announcing
sr-only is preferred over visibility:hidden for labels
